Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean, comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Ian2109
Reviews.Content: ive stayed short trips berlin hotel convenient airport tegel near underground station opera parking available required night spotlessly clean breakfast standard smallish hotels including bacon egg sausages fruit te usual muesli rolls staff friendly german hotels wireless internet free doesnt bother own connection underground runs beneath hotel heard rumbling fourth floor doesnt bother disturb people excellent value money 68 eur including breakfast

HotelInfo.Name: ibis Styles Berlin an der Oper
HotelInfo.Address: Bismarckstrasse 100, 10625 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Comfort Hotel An der Oper)
